name: Name Generator
description: This is a random names generator. If you need create random name or fantasy name for games and registering in social networks - this application will help you! The app will help come up with a fake name, account name or baby name.  No need to think long and invent an interesting name - just click generate and created new name for you!  Features of the application: - Always create a random name. - You can select the number of letters in the name - Create random english name - Free name generator - Friendly interface - Fast and easy name generator - Possibility to copy generated name - Usernames generator - Generate multiple names - Rare name generation - Name maker  Create the best nickname for yourself!  This application is created for entertainment purposes and is not trying to offend anyone.
